name: RSI Spectrum - Darker
description: A darker theme for Spectrum on RobertsSpaceIndustries.com You can submit your feeback here. Referral Code: STAR-TVD2-N64M I strongly recommend using the Stylus plugin to make use of this theme.
additional_info:
Version 1.4.4
    Changed the color of the Message of the Day so it stands out better.

Version 1.4.3
    <strike>Quick fix for an issue on the pledge store CCU system.</strike>

Version 1.4.2
    Quick fix for an issue on the pledge store CCU system.

Version 1.4.1
    Reduced whitespace in the user list.

Version 1.4.0
    Reduced the excessive whitespace of Spectrum chat. Made things more compact.

Version 1.3.1
    Adjusted hover-color for chat lines to be a shade darker

Version 1.3.0
    Adjusted the Org landing page background color
    Darkened the background of forum section headers in Org landing page

Version 1.2.2
    Embedded media in chat now has a better contrast

Version 1.2.1
    Text in forum replies is now the same blue as the OP

Version 1.2.0
    Now using variables to make color changes easier and sweeping
    Forum thread pages are now darker

Version 1.1.1
    Added thin blue line between chat and sidebar for when scrollbar is hidden

Version 1.1.0
    Forum threads are now darker
    Sidebar is now darker

Version 1.0.0
    Chat line background colors reversed between normal and hover.
    Input bar adjusted to match chat background darkness
    Notifications on bookmarks now use same orange as the little notification dot
    Scrollbars are skinned for Firefox users
